description: Minor amendment to the elevational treatment of the front elevation at ground floor level (louvers to replace one pane of glass in HN2, automatic doors to replace manual doors at main entrance, and one new door in existing louvered panel), and the rear elevation at both ground and lower ground levels (enlargement of windows, replacement of one window with door, provision of louvers at lower ground floor, four new windows to the rear of No. 17 Hornsey Street).
decision_conditions: 1. Condition (3) of the original planning permission (P041231) requires that details of signage are submitted to the Local Planning Authority for their written approval. This application for the consideration of minor amendments to the elevational treatment at ground floor of the front elevation (Hornsey Street) and the ground and lower ground floors of the rear elevations does not agree any proposals for signage.
